Detailed Description

This is a helper class to substitute strings.

Member Function Documentation

std::string PyInputSubstituter::substitute ( const std::string &  line,
PyObject *  pModule = NULL,
const char *  funcName = "expandMacros" 
) [static]

Perform dollar substitution on this line, using the named function from the provided module.

If the module isn't provided, the personality module is used.
